entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support configuring document-level parts of OpenAPI schema #44192
    .NET 8 Planning
  • .NET 7.0: Output Caching: Evaluate policy after other middleware processed the request #44191
  • Please reinstate Microsoft.AspNetCore.SpaServices for .NET 6 LTS #44187
  • Quarantine `ClosingTheBrowserWindow_GracefullyDisconnects_TheCurrentCircuit` #44185
  • Adding a css file as a linked file, does not work #44184
  • Publishing a server hosted wasm app fails in dotnet 7 rc1 #44182
  • [SignalR] HTTPS connection failed, and The server disconnected before the handshake could be started. #44181
  • How to properly destroy javascript component and avoid JSDisconnectedException #44180
  • Change docs.microsoft.com links to learn.microsoft.com #44175

Closed

  • Quarantine ClosingTheBrowserWindow_GracefullyDisconnects_TheCurrentCircuit #44017
    8.0-MQ
  • Add an Analyzer to recommend using DIM properties with IHeaderDictionary instead of indexer #44116
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ASP.NET Core v6.0.8 source build sucessed and installed ,but enter f11 can't view source code #43673
  • Mariner queue crash in Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Common.Tests #41481
    Test failures
  • DotNetObjectReference in docs multiple instances created, only last one disposed #44189
  • .NET 7 RC1 ASP.Net Core Output Caching: Memory leak in MemoryOutputCacheStore? #44169
  • [Blazor WASM] Getting value from resx always return default value. #44150
  • Get child tag by name #44163
  • SPA proxying breaks with double-slash at beginning of path #43662
    8.0-preview1
  • Blazor: remove all jQuery events when DOM is removed #44176
  • Blazor empty template doesn't load scoped CSS #43975
    7.0.0
  • [Blazor Server] Blazor Server Freezes When Opening A New Tab #44124
  • Consider updating the static file middleware to return cache-control: no-cache in Development #44153
  • Signal R - Error: Server timeout elapsed without receiving a message from the server #42043
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Read HTTP_PORTS and HTTPS_PORTS into IServerAddresses #44194
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44193
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Add header dictionary analyzer and fixer #44123
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Quarantine `ClosingTheBrowserWindow_GracefullyDisconnects_TheCurrentCircuit` #44186
    test-failure, tell-mode
  • [release/7.0] Use Ubuntu 20.04 a bit more #44173
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44183
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `1336c4b` to `63907e1` #44178
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Remove attributes from SVG elements #43957
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add comment to WebAssembly empty template about scoped CSS. Fixes #43975 #44142
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Update Roslyn versions #44072
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44174
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Add loc comments and fix Windows installer bug #44170
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2004227 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • Route tooling redux #44077
  • [release/7.0] Update Roslyn Versions #44148
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure
  • Fix flaky HTTP/2 test #41181
    area-runtime
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    area-runtime
  • Add FieldIdentifier Indexer handling #41628
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • CreatedResult should accept null location #42576
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Simplify and optimize async parameters in RequestDelegateFactory #42588
    area-runtime
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [Blazor] [WebView] Avoid Base64 encoding because Json Serializer should do that #43923
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Better logs in AuthorizationMiddleware #43862
    area-security, community-contribution
  • feat: use the value of the variable directly #43793
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • Update tests to reflect change of web app manifest extension in React C# template #43765
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [Blazor WebAssembly] Change web app manifest extension to “webmanifest” #43756
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Improve pfx support for CertificateConfigLoader #43719
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Update gRPC and Protobuf dependencies #43709
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 7.0.0
  • Update SpaProxy.cs #43663
    area-mvc, feature-spa, community-contribution
  • [SignalR] [Java] Log 'WebSocket stopped' once #43532
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java
  • Nullable cleanup #43451
    area-web-frameworks
  • Annotate WebAssembly.Authentication for nullability #43442
    area-blazor
  • Remove use of Expression.Constant in RequestDelegateFactory #43380
    area-runtime
  • [blazor][wasm] load .js and .wasm assets by runtime #43049
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm
  • Add framework route parameter completion #42910
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Guard against httpcontext disconnect race #42838
    area-runtime
  • Cleanup Mvc Analyzers #42754
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Use perfect-hash in HttpUriScheme.GetKnownMethod(string) instead of trie #44096
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • fix dotnet#43523 HttpSys Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding conflicts #44144
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Use Ubuntu 20.04 a bit more #44172
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Add RequestDelegate analyzer #44048
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime
  • Fix ANCM hosting bundle conditions for older OS #44155
  • [release/7.0] Change gRPC JSON to only accept top-level field as request body #44055
    Servicing-consider, area-grpc, 7.0.0
